name: Objects editor
description: Edit objects name, description and sort order
descriptionTemplate: Processing objects: %:o:%:{{%:newObjectsNames:% ?? Renaming objects following this rules: %:renamedObjectsNames:%.::}}{{%:objectsDescription:% ?? New description for objects will be "%:objectsDescription:%".::}}{{%:objectsOrder:% == 0 ?? :: New sort order for all objects will be a %:objectsOrder:% ({{%:objectsOrder:% == 10 ?? On top of the list ::}}{{%:objectsOrder:% == 30 ?? Between middle and top :: }}{{%:objectsOrder:% == 50 ?? At the middle of the list :: }}{{%:objectsOrder:% == 70 ?? Between middle and end :: }}{{%:objectsOrder:% == 100 ?? At the end of the list :: }}{{%:objectsOrder:% == 1 ?? On top and at up level :: }}{{%:objectsOrder:% == 5 ?? At the middle and at up level :: }}{{%:objectsOrder:% == 9 ?? At the end and at up level :: }}).}}{{%:disabled:% ?? Objects will be disabled for collecting data from counters ::}}

objectsDescription.description: New description for all edited objects. If empty, then description will be unchanges

objectsOrder.description: New sort order for all edited obejcts. If "0" then sort order will be unchanged

rulesForRenameObjects.description: Stringified JSON object, used as a rule for rename objects. Format of this objects is a [{"id": XX, "name": "newObjectNameXX"}, {..}, ...]

renamedObjectsNames.description: Objects renaming rules. Used only for action description

objectsRE.description: Regular expression for rename objects. Used only on client (browser) side of this action for create new objects names

newObjectsNames.description: Regular expression rules for rename objects. Used only on client (browser) side of this action for create new objects names

disabled.description: Disabled (1) or enabled (empty) objects for collecting data from counters
